mapper.select: SELECT sp_pp_work.pp_work_number , sp_pp_work.pp_work_name , sp_pp_work.pp_work_startday , sp_pp_work.pp_work_endday , sp_pp_work.pp_work_area , sp_pp_work.pp_work_content , sp_pp.pp_number , sp_farm.f_number , sp_farm.f_name FROM sp_pp_work JOIN sp_pp JOIN sp_farm ON sp_pp_work.pp_number = sp_pp.pp_number AND sp_pp_work.f_number = sp_farm.f_number WHERE sp_pp_work.pp_work_number=#{ppWorkNumber}
